author: bmarzocc
body:
PR description:

This PR is needed for the ECAL Run3 clustering studies. In this PR I change the dataformat of the simClusters, which are used for producing the caloParticle collection. Once this is merged, a central production of samples will be asked. For the moment I ask the PR into CMSSW master, then a backporting to the suitable CMSSW release will be asked

Badder
title: CaloParticle additional hitsAndEnergies from SimClusters: data format change
